properties.prosubsectoren: REFORM / MODERNIZATION OF THE STATE-DECENTRALIZATION & INTER
properties.proname: Support for the National Public Investment System
properties.proexecutor: Ministerio De Economia Y Finanzas Publicas
properties.prodescription: The proposed project will constitute a second stage of a previous Bank operation to support the decentralization process of the National Public Investment System (SNIP) and the financing of preinvestment studies. The design of the second stage will take into consideration the results of the final evaluation of the Bank's 993/SF-BO loan. The project will include five components: (i) Consolidation of the organizational and functional structure; (ii) Developing of methodological instruments; (iii) Training of human resources; (iv) strengthening of public investment information system; and (v) financing of pre-investment studies

properties.proname: Santa Bárbara-Rurrenabaque Northern Corridor Highway Improvement
properties.prodescription: The Program is an investment loan directed to facilitate integration at the national level, specifically between the municipalities of Beni and La Paz, as well as giving access to Rurrenabaque, an important tourist center and small-scale agricultural area whose population is pushing to move their products by generating pressure over forest areas. Another objective of the Program is to improve connectivity between La Paz and San Borja, being the latter a livestock area prone to seasonal floods. In this sense, the highway Rurrenabaque-Yucumo-San Borja will work as a supporting axe of the region's trade and productivity. This operation is linked to a wider program named Northern Corridor that has for objective connecting La Paz with Guayamerín, on the border with Brazil, and Cobija, capital of the State of Pando, creating the La Paz-Trinidad-Santa Cruz- La Paz corridor. The Northern Corridor Program is considered a priority for the Initiative for Regional Infrastructure Integration in Sou

properties.proname: Social Protection and Community Integral Development
properties.prodescription: Mejorar las condiciones de vida de la población en extrema pobreza de tres regiones rurales y una sub-región urbana del país, fortaleciendo sus capacidades de organización comunitaria y generando de forma integral, participativa y autogestionaria un entorno que les garantice el acceso a mejores oportunidades y capacidades de desarrollo individual y comunitario.

properties.proname: Small Community Water Program
properties.proexecutor: Fnd Nac.De Inver. Productiva Y Social
properties.prodescription: The Program comprises the construction and putting into operation of potable water and sanitation systems for small rural communities. The Program will comprise three components: 1) Construction and putting into operations of the systems, 2) Community development to support the organization of the community for the sustainable operation of the systems, and 3) Institutional strengthening for the Deputy Ministry of Basic Services in the support of rural water systems.

properties.proname: Performance-based Road Maintenance Program
properties.prodescription: Given the roads subsector's strategic importance to Bolivia's sustainable development, and that deficient maintenance management mechanisms and insufficient maintenance budgets are inevitably translating into a steady decline of conditions on the RVF, the Government of Bolivia -through the ABC- asked the Bank for a loan to carry out a performance-based road maintenance program. The proposed program is aligned eith the objectives and policies set out in Bolivia's National Development Plan as well as those of the Bank's country strategy and will enable the ABC to switch from unit price contracts to service level contracts and to try out new concepts and tools for management and conservation of the RVF, therby avoiding the premature deterioration of the road system in general while ensuring an adequate level of service for users at a reasonable cost. Also, given that the "Provial Bolivia" conservation program has already provided a first experience with service-level contracts for routine

properties.prosubsectoren: AGRICULTURE AND RURAL DEVELOPMENT-IRRIGATION AND DRAINAGE
properties.proname: National Irrigation Program with a Watershed Approach
properties.prodescription: The program consists of a proposal structured around three components:i) Irrigation water management with a basin focus; ii) Investments, and iii) Management in order to improve the competitiveness of irrigated agriculture.

properties.proname: Drainage in the Municipios of La Paz and El Alto
properties.proexecutor: Gobierno Autónomo Municipal De El Alto
properties.prodescription: The project objective is to help improve quality of life for inhabitants of the municipios of La Paz and El Alto by reducing the human loss and property damage caused by extreme geo-hydro-meteorological events through the construction ofworks and complementary activities to improve the storm drainage systems of La Paz and El Alto and their management.

properties.proname: Road Conservation in the East-West Corridor
properties.prodescription: The Operation will consist n attending to the Periodic Maintenance of the Stretch Parotani: Confital of 75 km long and of the Stretch Holy Spirit II: Ivirgazama of a length of 85 km, and it includes the supervision of the works.

properties.proname: Multiphase Program in Support of the Plan to Eradicate Extreme Poverty (PEEP)-I
properties.prodescription: El Gobierno de Bolivia (GoB) ha delineado el Plan Vida, cuya implementación es responsabilidad de la unidad ejecutora (UE) del Plan de Erradicación de la Extrema Pobreza (PEEP) del MPD, en el marco del Plan Nacional de Desarrollo (PND). El Proyecto apoyará al Gobierno de Bolivia en la preparación e implementación de componentes seleccionados del Plan Vida. En particular, el Proyecto enfatizará atención a familias en extrema pobreza a través de transferencias monetarias condicionadas y la oferta de servicios de salud para mujeres embarazadas y niños menores a 2 años.

properties.proname: Water and Sewerage Program in Peri Urban Areas Phase I
properties.proexecutor: Ministerio De Medio Ambiente Y Agua
properties.prodescription: Investments in works to treat and distribute potable water, as well as collect and treat wastewater, in periurban areas.Technical assistance for operators to meet operational and financial criteria.

properties.prosubsectoren: AGRICULTURE AND RURAL DEVELOPMENT-AGRICULTURAL HEALTH AND FO
properties.proname: Agricultural Health and Food Safety Program
properties.proexecutor: Ministerio De Desarrollo Rural, Agropecuario Y Medio Ambiente
properties.prodescription: The program could include activities in: animal health, plant health, agrifood safety, improvement of institutional management and regional integration with the countries of American region.

properties.proname: Neighborhood Improvement Multiphase Program, Phase I
properties.prodescription: The program will have three components: 1) investments in the Municipality of La Paz; 2) Investments in other municipalities of the country; and 3) Institutional strengthening of the implementing agencies.

properties.proname: National Community Tourism Program
properties.proexecutor: Ministerio De Culturas Del Estado Plurinacional De Bolivia
properties.prodescription: Includes investments and management actions grouped in three components: i) direct support to communities through tourism investments within a context of territorial development in priority destinations; ii) improvement of public goods; and iii) institutional strengthening.

properties.prosubsectoren: AGRICULTURE AND RURAL DEVELOPMENT-SUSTAINABLE AGRICULTURAL D
properties.proname: Direct Supports for the Creation of Rural Agrifood Initiatives
properties.proexecutor: Ministerio De Desarrollo Rural Y Tierras
properties.prodescription: The Program has two components: i) direct supports for the adoption of agrifood technologies; and ii) support for agrifood enterprises.

properties.proname: Misicuni Renewable Energy Hydroelectric Project
properties.prodescription: The Misicuni Multipurpose Project is located in the Department of Cochabamba, and it's objective is to supply the central Cochabamba Valley with potable water, irrigation water and electric power generation for the National Interconnected System (NIS). Due to the dry weather conditions, the Cochabamba Valley has historically faced a water supply problem aggravated by the population growth in the region. On the other hand, the country needs to increase it¿s generation capacity preferably from renewable sources. The whole project comprises the construction of a 120-m high rock filled and concrete face dam, a 20km tunnel for water diversion (finalized in 2005 with the financial support form the Government of Italy), a pressurized piping system (from 3.700 to 2.700 meters above sea level) that conveys a controlled water flow from the tunnel to the power plant to be built in the Cochabamba Valley. The dam construction contract (US$85 million) has been awarded and the financing is in place.

properties.prosubsectoren: REFORM / MODERNIZATION OF THE STATE-REFORM AND PUBLIC SECTOR
properties.proname: Transparency and Anticorruption Program
properties.proexecutor: Ministerio De Transparencia Institucional Y Lucha Contra La Corrupción
properties.prodescription: This operation will help to support the implementation of activities prioritize by the government of Bolivia in the four axes that comprise the transparency policy: citizen participation, strengthening the transparency for public management and the right to access the information, measures to eradicate corruption, and mechanism to ensure institutional strengthening and coordination.

properties.proname: Rural Electrification Program
properties.prodescription: The general objective of the program is to contribute to enhancing the quality of life of the low-income population without access or with limited access to electricity by expanding and improving electricity coverage.

properties.proname: Program to Support Employment
properties.proexecutor: Ministerio De Trabajo, Empleo Y Previsión Social
properties.prodescription: Extend coverage and effectiveness of active employment policies, through the creation of a job placement program for young adults 25 to 30 years old and the expansion and consolidation of labor intermediation services offered by the Dirección General de Empleo.

properties.prosubsectoren: ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL DISASTERS-ENVIRONMENTAL MANAGEMENT A
properties.proname: Environmental Management of Misicuni Watershed
properties.prodescription: The project pretend to supplement and strengthen measures to mitigate the indirect impacts Misicuni Project on the environment and on people living in the main reservoir basin in order to help ensure the sustainability of investments made by the GOBO for hydrologic use the river Misicuni and support environmental and social sustainability of the watershed

properties.proname: Cochabamba - La Paz Transmission Line
properties.prodescription: The operation will finance the construction of a new 230 kV transmission line between Cochabamba and La Paz. This line will improve the security of supply in the north of the National Interconnected System, particularly in the cities of La Paz, el Alto and Trinidad.

properties.proname: Environmental Social Protection Sta Cruz - Pto. Suarez
properties.proexecutor: Ministerio De Desarrollo Sostenible Y Medio Ambiante
properties.prodescription: El objetivo del Proyecto es minimizar, controlar, contrarrestar y compensar los impactos socio-ambientales directos, indirectos, cumulativos, de largo plazo o sinérgicios que serán provocados por la implantación y operación del corredor vial Santa Cruz-Puerto Suárez, promoviendo la conservación ambiental y un proceso de desarrollo económico y social sotenible en el área de influencia, de acuerdo con la legislación boliviana y las normas del Banco en la materia.

properties.prosubsectoren: REFORM / MODERNIZATION OF THE STATE-FISCAL POLICY FOR SUSTAI
properties.proname: Local Development and Fiscal Adjustment
properties.proexecutor: Ministerio De Economia Y Finanzas Publicas
properties.prodescription: APOYA AL DESARROLLO REGIONAL Y LOCAL A TRAVES DEL FINANCIAMIENTO DE INVERSIONES Y DE SEVICIOS URBANOS Y SOCIALES MUNICIPALES, LA PROMOCION DE LA PARTICIPACION PRIVADA EN LA PRESTACION DE SERVICIOS LOCALES, EL FORTALECIMIENTO INSTITUCIONAL, TRIBUTARIO Y DE LA CAPACIDAD DE REGULACION DE LOS MUNICIPIOS, Y LA REFORMA DEL MODELO DE FINANCIAMIENTO LOCAL.

properties.proname: Northern Corridor Highway Program: La Paz - Caranavi Section, IIRSA Hub
properties.prodescription: Para el Programa se han definido los siguientes componentes principales:(i) Rehabilitación del tramo La Paz – Cotapata: que incluye obras de estabilización y drenaje en algunos sitios puntuales y la capa de rodadura del tramo desde el límite municipal de La Paz (km 6 aproximadamente) a Cotapata (km 50).(ii) Construcción de obras de estabilización del tramo Cotapata – Santa Bárbara, Gestión del Riesgo y Conservación Vial del tramo La Paz - Cotapata - Santa Bárbara: que incluye (i) la construcción de obras de corrección de pasivos socio-ambientales existentes en el tramo Cotapata-Santa Bárbara (obras de estabilización de buzones, drenajes, programas de capacitación, etc.); obras de carácter geotécnico (recuperación de cauces y estabilidad de taludes); y otras obras de mejoramiento en el corredor Cotapata-Santa Bárbara; (ii) el diseño e implementación de un sistema de gestión de riesgo e implantación de un sistema de alerta temprana para la carretera; y (iii) el mantenimiento preventivo y

properties.prosubsectoren: AGRICULTURE AND RURAL DEVELOPMENT-LAND ADMINISTRATION AND MA
properties.proname: Land Regularization and Legal Cadastre
properties.prodescription: The Program has two components: (i) regularization and improvement of land property rights; y (ii) consolidation of technical bases for the maintenance of the Legal Cadastre.

properties.proname: La Paz Storm Drainage Program
properties.prodescription: To improve the capacity of the Municipality to participate in the preventive actions and contingency planning to attend situation of disaster caused when the drainage system is compromised because of critical methodological phenomena.
